thread.title: British man gets 20-year sentence in US terror case
thread.title_full: British man gets 20-year sentence in US terror case - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: wcax.com
title: British man gets 20-year sentence in US terror case
text:
NEW YORK (AP) - A U.S. judge has sentenced a British man diagnosed with schizophrenia to 20 years in prison for joining a plot to set up a terrorist training camp in Oregon.
Haroon Aswat received the sentence on Friday in federal court in Manhattan.
The 41-year Aswat pleaded guilty in March to terrorism-related charges. Prosecutors accused him of conspiring with radical Muslim cleric Abu Hamza al-Masri to establish the camp 15 years ago.
Aswat apologized to the court and to his family before hearing the sentence. Defense attorneys said afterward he will get credit for about 10 years behind bars while fighting extradition in the United Kingdom.
The lawyers also said that Aswat will seek to serve the remainder of his time in Britain.
